value:
This world is beautiful indeed. But it
bears little resemblance to the world
I'm building—one founded on ideals.

The world I came from is on the
verge of a new era. It's engulfed in
war... But not for long, I think.

You're always rushing here and there.
Your life is fraught with hardship—I
suppose we have that in common.

Ideals never become reality without
sacrifices... Sacrifices only a few
could ever countenance.

I dealt with the usurper—I had no
choice. To build a just world, Sigurd
had to die.

I am Arvis. I was sent as an envoy of
$Nf.

Any who stand in my path will be
burnt to cinders!
I must grow stronger.
Completely unacceptable!

I'm a champion of the people—
like the crusaders before me.

I am Arvis. I descend from the
crusaders Fjalar and Maera.

How do you envision this world?
What form do you think it should take,
$Nu?$k$pCast aside trifles, like who won or
lost yesterday's battle. What are your
plans for shaping the world?$k$pYou understand what I'm getting at,
don't you? People like us...we have
the power to change the world.$k$pYour abilities are remarkable.
Understand, then, that I believe it
is your duty to guide this world.$k$pI, myself, will not stop until I can return
to my world and mold it into its ideal
form.$k$pFor the sake of that task, I ask you:
What sort of world would you like to
see? I must hear your answer.
ふん
Burn!
うああっ！
Insurgent...
I sentence you to death.
For a better world.
Opposing me is treason.
Hellfire upon you!
Deirdre, Julia...
Hmmpt
Well, now. Let's see what you're capable of.
What is it that you think you're doing? You're getting awfully familiar.
If you can only understand one thing, make it this: I have no intention of bowing to your will.
I'm willing to burn the world with my hellfire.
To make my ideals a reality, I'd sacrifice anything...or anyone.
I will remake the world—tear down divisions and make things equitable for all.
So tell me! I want to know what it is that you believe in.
Out with it!
What's your gambit?
Of course.
